channel.title: scrapy on yikwing`s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in scrapy on yikwing`s Blog

item.title: ubuntu从零开始搭建爬虫框架
item.description: 更换ubuntu apt源 查看ubuntu开发代号 shell sudo lsb_release -a ## linux路径 sudo vim /etc/apt/sources.list deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ artful main restricted universe multiverse deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ artful-security main restricted universe multiverse deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ artful-updates main restricted universe multiverse deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ artful-proposed main restricted universe multiverse deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ artful-backports

item.title: scrapy语法
item.description: xpath语法 表达式 说明 article 选取所有article元素的所有子节点 /article 选取根元素article article/a 选取所有属于article的子元素的a元素 //div 选取
